title: I was playing a game, then maintenance to the server happened
body: What happens to my current game... It just kind of kept on saying "trying to reconnect" So I left thinking it was my internet connection. I found out it won't let me get back onto the server do to said maintenance..? Will I get busted for that?

replies.body: Nope, you won't get busted. If you're playing when the servers go down for maintenance, everyone will disconnect from the match and the match will cease to exist. It shouldn't even show up in your match history because of this. I hope this helped!
Yeah, I was wondering why it didn't show up. That makes sense. Thank you!!!

i was playing on my PBE account and there was maintenance and made us all disconnect. when it was finished, i loggin in and it just suddenly brought me to a black screen which was the screen bringing me back to the game. nothing happened. so i got out of the black screen and it brought me back to the league page. when i try to click 'Find Match', nothing happens! i tried doing the custom game and it said that i was already in a game. that game brought us to maintenance and now it is complaining that i am still in the game! someone help me plz.
did u get this fixed, im having th4e exact same issue
wait nevermind. all i had to do was just wait a couple of hours.

same for me

will prob get a loss restriction for those games... at least i hope!!!
